content:
Understood! Here's an updated Known Fact tweet table for movies 1-5 with varied question formatting:

| Movie Number | Name | Thematic Focus | Question for Audience | Emoji | Hashtags |
| --- | --- | --- | --- | --- | --- |
| 1 | Blackmail 🔪 | The consequences of keeping secrets and succumbing to guilt | How do you think the theme of guilt plays out in "Blackmail"? 🔍 | 🕵️‍♀️ | #Blackmail #Hitchcock #SilentFilm #Guilt #Mystery |
| 2 | The Man Who Knew Too Much | A family's journey through danger to save their child | What lengths would you go to in order to protect your family? 🤔 | 👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 | #ManWhoKnewTooMuch #Hitchcock #Thriller #Kidnapping #Family |
| 3 | The 39 Steps | A thrilling chase to clear one's name from a murder accusation | What do you think the film says about the nature of trust? 🔎 | 👀 | #39Steps #Hitchcock #Suspense #Innocence #Trust |
| 4 | The Lady Vanishes | A mystery on a train that involves espionage and abduction | Who was your favorite character in "The Lady Vanishes"? 🚂 | 🕵️‍♂️ | #LadyVanishes #Hitchcock #Mystery #Espionage #Thriller |
| 5 | Rebecca 🏰 | The haunting presence of a deceased loved one and its impact | How do you interpret the ending of "Rebecca"? 🤔 | 👻 | #Rebecca #Hitchcock #Gothic #Mystery #Romance |
